title: DDFP 398: Week 7 review & AFC Wild Card race
itunes:title: DDFP 398: Week 7 review & AFC Wild Card race
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Dan Hanzus to discuss Monday Night Football, the AFC Wild Card race and who will win the NFC West. Then, Ike Taylor and Maurice Jones-Drew join the show to talk about what it feels like to be responsible for a loss and the sideline controversy between Greg Hardy and Dez Bryant. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
